node.cost: Buy something from the them to sit down.
node.name: Mc Donalds The Buzz
node.notes: Good amount of comfortable seating. Lots of people working on laptops but they will look at you funny if you stay too long. Didn't see many plugs.

node.cost: You can pay for access to the co-working space. But free at coffee shop.
node.description: Coworking space and incubation hub. There is a coffee shop with access.
node.name: Tshimologong Precinct
node.notes: There is a coffee shop at the entrance which doesn't require access control. You can sit here and do some work, while I see people work here without buying coffee. I would buy something. They have a proper co-working space that has access control which you can sign up to, check the website. Parking is on the street.

node.cost: Buy something from the coffee shop to sit down.
node.description: Coffee shop with some seating in a mall.
node.name: Vida E Caffe Design Quarter
node.notes: There are a couple seating options. Its a bit open as its in the hallway of the shopping center, however its not a high traffic shopping center. There are a few plugs for your laptop. It's a little bright as the roof is semi transparent letting the sun in.
